channel.title: ExtremeTech
channel.description: ExtremeTech is the Web's top destination for news and analysis of emerging science and technology trends, and important software, hardware, and gadgets.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 Ziff Davis, LLC. All Rights Reserved.
